string.name: zenMode
string.comment:
zenMode
This is not the religious meaning. Turning this option on takes away make elements of the user interface.
Can also translate as 'Focus mode' as one example.

resources.string: Dit laat toe om alle graderings weg te steek om te help fokus op die skaak. Spelle kan steeds gegradeer word; dit is slegs oor wat jy kan sien.
Vertoon opsie om bord se groote te verander

string.name: whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
string.comment:
whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
The < symbol is not required (you can write it as a word), just do NOT use < in its place.
Technical information: < is a reserved character in HTML, which is why it cannot be used.

string.name: gameBehavior
string.comment:
gameBehavior
In the user settings page, "Game behavior" is the title of the tab for configuring how the player can interact with the game.

resources.string: Druk die <ctrl>-sleutel terwyl jy promoveer om outo-promovering tydelik te deaktiveer
Eis gelykop met drievoudige repetisie outomaties

string.name: snapArrowsToValidMoves
string.comment:
snapArrowsToValidMoves
The 'arrows' are for quick annotations you can do on the board, by holding right mouse button. With this setting enabled, it means the arrows will align themselves to places were pieces can move.

string.name: sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
string.comment:
sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
When enabled, this setting will automatically send 'Good game, well played' to your opponent if you are lose or draw the game. It's meant as a courtesy message.
The message will be sent in ENGLISH.
It is up to you how to deal with this. For example, you may want to put '(message will be sent in English)' in your translated text as one example. Or you can leave the actual English text and put a brief translation in your own language.

resources.string: Sê \"Good game, well played\" (Goeie spel, mooi gespeel) met \'n nederlaag of gelykop
Roll die muis op die bord om skuiwe te herspeel
Daaglikse e-pos met \'n lys van jou korrespondensiespelle

string.name: notifyStreamStart
string.comment:
notifyStreamStart
A notification setting - notifies players when a streamer they follow on Lichess has started streaming

string.name: notifyInboxMsg
string.comment:
notifyInboxMsg
A notification setting - notifies players when they receive a new message in their Lichess inbox

string.name: notifyForumMention
string.comment:
notifyForumMention
A notification setting - notifies players when someone has @mentioned their name in the Lichess Forum (https://lichess.org/forum)

string.name: notifyInvitedStudy
string.comment:
notifyInvitedStudy
A notification setting - notifies players about invites to studies (https://lichess.org/study/)

string.name: notifyGameEvent
string.comment:
notifyGameEvent
A notification setting - notifies players about updates in correspondence games

string.name: notifyChallenge
string.comment:
notifyChallenge
A notification setting - notifies players about incoming challenges.

string.name: notifyTournamentSoon
string.comment:
notifyTournamentSoon
A notification setting - notifies players if a tournament is starting soon.

string.name: notifyTimeAlarm
string.comment:
notifyTimeAlarm
A notification setting when there are only a few hours left before your time runs out.

string.name: notifyBell
string.comment:
notifyBell
A notification setting - toggles a bell sound being played when a notification appears.

string.name: notifyPush
string.comment:
notifyPush
Also known as a 'push notification', this is a setting for device notifications.

resources.string: Toetstel kennisgewing wanneer jy nie op Lichess is nie

string.name: notifyWeb
string.comment: notifyWeb Lets players set native web browser notifications on and off

string.name: notifyDevice
string.comment: notifyDevice Lets players toggle device notifications on and off when they are not on Lichess
